Comment.Language: For the 29th of each Coptic Month:

Text.Language: All/louia: All/louia I/couc Pi,~rictoc Ps/ri m~Vnou]: af[icarx qen ]paryenoc: acmacf n~je ]paryenoc qen B/yleem n~te }iodea: aftwnf e~bol qen n/eymwout qen pie~hoou m~mahsomt.
Alleluia, Alleluia Jesus Christ, the Son of God, is incarnate of the Virgin: is born of the Virgin in Bethlehem of Judea: is risen from the dead, on the third day.
